titleStmt.title: A description of the ceremonial proceedings at the coronation of their most sacred majesties, King William III. and Queen Mary II. Who were crowned at Westminster-Abby, on Thursday the 11th. of April, 1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Croom at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle
